subtitle: qadīm se jadīd daur tak Mag̲h̲rib kī Islām dushmanī kī dāstān
title: Tahzīb va taraqqī kī oṭ men̲ Afghānistan se ʻIrāq tak Musalmānon̲ par kyā guzrī?
other_titles: Afghānistan se ʻIrāq tak Musalmānon̲ par kyā guzrī?

description.value: Historical study of alleged conspiracies of West specially United States of America against Muslims from 19th century to 20th century.

notes.value:
"Āj mādī taraqqī ke jis māḍal ke pīche Musalmān merāthan res lagā rahe hain̲ voh taraqqī-yi Islām kā maqṣūd nahīn̲. Lekin isī taraqqī aur miʻyār -i zindagī ke davām ke liye Mag̲h̲rib jahān̲ tahān̲ musalmānon̲ ko apne hadaf par rakhe huʼe hain̲ kih voh sab ṭhahre "Dahshatgard"".

Includes bibliographical references (p. 302-304).

In Urdu.
